body_html:
Personally I decided to use the "TF SLIM “ API juste before the 1.2 release : where the dataset API was introduced. I don’t know the best solution right know.

body:
Personally I decided to use the "TF SLIM “ API juste before the 1.2 release : where the dataset API was introduced.
I don’t know the best solution right know.
